page.title: 04FARMING ARBROOK FARM
page.content: Arbrook Farm is owned by the Crown Estate Commissioners.The land has been farmed for 900 yrs.Some land lost to A3.Tunnel under A3 to link land.Land for grazing sheep,cattle.100 beef cat_ tle,350{wool}and{meat}ewes,6 rams.Lam_ bing Feb_Mar.Av.350_600{lambs}per sea_ son.Shear own sheep.Sells to slaughter house who sells to butcher.No{bulls. Buys week_old,rears till 18 mnths.Cat_ tle and sheep equal in importance. Animals diet :grass,some barley and minerals,maize.Due to lack of copper intake injects{sheep}anually.Records kept of each animal.No computer.Pigs, hens for personal use.Uses harvesters, haymakers,tractors,mixers,feeders.Sil_ age and hay stored.Uses pollutants as little as can.Hedges chopped in past. Dogs and foxes have been trouble.Fox_ hunting not permitted.Has own vegetab_ le garden.
